attributes.additional_details:
sadly in 2006 Shaun Smith and Steven Robinson followed by David John Jones in 2013 died at the wynd, Amble (A1068) by fatal car crashes.

Coun Jeff Watson wants us to take down the memory's away as they are a distraction to motorists.

I for one do not believe they are a distraction, its a memory to the three people that lost there life's. somewhere for people to go and remember the good times of there beloved friends or family members.
who is he to tell us its time to move on ? and is this the start of other counties been told to take there items down?  please sign, so we can tell Jeff Watson that as a community we want them left alone and for a long time to come ...
